chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: CompleteSpace

Goal:
forall P Q : T -> Prop, (forall x : T, P x <-> Q x) -> close (iota P) (iota Q)

Premises:
iota = fun P : T -> Prop => lim (fun A : T -> Prop => forall x : T, P x -> A x) : (T -> Prop) -> T Argument scope is [function_scope]
close = fun (M : UniformSpace) (x y : M) => forall eps : posreal, ball x eps y : forall M : UniformSpace, M -> M -> Prop Argument M is implicit and maximally inserted
Record Q : Set := Qmake { Qnum : Z; Qden : positive } For Qmake: Argument scopes are [Z_scope positive_scope]
iota_correct_weak : forall P : T -> Prop, (forall x y : T, P x -> P y -> close x y) -> forall x : T, P x -> close (iota P) x
Build_Filter : forall (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), F (fun _ : T => True) -> (forall P Q : T -> Prop, F P -> F Q -> F (fun x : T => P x /\ Q x)) -> (forall P Q : T -> Prop, (forall x : T, P x -> Q x) -> F P -> F Q) -> Filter F
PropExtensionalityFacts.PropExt_and_PropFunExt_imp_PredExt : (forall A B : Prop, A <-> B -> A = B) -> (forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x = Q x) -> P = Q) -> forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x <-> Q x) -> P = Q
PropExtensionalityFacts.PredExt_imp_PropFunExt : (forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x <-> Q x) -> P = Q) -> forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x = Q x) -> P = Q
PropExtensionalityFacts.PropExt_and_PropFunExt_iff_PredExt : (forall A B : Prop, A <-> B -> A = B) /\ (forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x = Q x) -> P = Q) < -> (forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x <-> Q x) -> P = Q)
PropExtensionalityFacts.PredExt_imp_PropExt : (forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x <-> Q x) -> P = Q) -> forall A B : Prop, A < -> B -> A = B
Record Filter (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) : Prop := Build_Filter { filter_true : F (fun _ : T => True); filter_and : forall P Q : T -> Prop, F P -> F Q -> F (fun x : T => P x /\ Q x); filter_imp : forall P Q : T -> Prop, (forall x : T, P x -> Q x) -> F P -> F Q } For Filter: Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted For Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope] For Build_Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _ function_scope function_scope]
ssrbool.iffP : forall (P Q : Prop) (b : bool), Bool.reflect P b -> (P -> Q) -> (Q -> P) -> Bool.reflect Q b
iffRL : forall P Q : Prop, P < -> Q -> Q -> P
iffLR : forall P Q : Prop, P < -> Q -> P -> Q
iffLRn : forall P Q : Prop, P < -> Q -> ~ P -> ~ Q
iffRLn : forall P Q : Prop, P < -> Q -> ~ Q -> ~ P
filter_imp : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x -> Q x) -> ?F P -> ?F Q where ?T : [T : CompleteSpace |- Type] ?F : [T : CompleteSpace |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Filter : [T : CompleteSpace |- Filter ?F]
filter_and : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, ?F P -> ?F Q -> ?F (fun x : ?T => P x /\ Q x) where ?T : [T : CompleteSpace |- Type] ?F : [T : CompleteSpace |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Filter : [T : CompleteSpace |- Filter ?F]
Build_ProperFilter : forall (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), (forall P : T -> Prop, F P -> exists x : T, P x) -> Filter F -> ProperFilter F
ssrbool.equivP : forall (P Q : Prop) (b : bool), Bool.reflect P b -> P < -> Q -> Bool.reflect Q b
Z.peano_ind : forall P : Z -> Prop, P 0%Z -> (forall x : Z, P x -> P (Z.succ x)) -> (forall x : Z, P x -> P (Z.pred x)) -> forall z : Z, P z
Z.bi_induction : forall P : Z -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful Z.eq iff) P -> P 0%Z -> (forall x : Z, P x <-> P (Z.succ x)) -> forall z : Z, P z
is_filter_lim = fun (T : UniformSpace) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (x : T) => forall P : T -> Prop, locally x P -> F P : forall T : UniformSpace, ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> T -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope _]
Record ProperFilter (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) : Prop := Build_ProperFilter { filter_ex : forall P : T -> Prop, F P -> exists x : T, P x; filter_filter : Filter F } For ProperFilter: Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted For ProperFilter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope] For Build_ProperFilter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope function_scope _]
filter_forall : forall P : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x) -> ?F P where ?T : [T : CompleteSpace |- Type] ?F : [T : CompleteSpace |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [T : CompleteSpace |- Filter ?F]
locally = fun (T : UniformSpace) (x : T) (P : T -> Prop) => exists eps : posreal, forall y : T, ball x eps y -> P y : forall T : UniformSpace, T -> (T -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope]
nat_ind : forall P : nat -> Prop, P 0%nat -> (forall n : nat, P n -> P (S n)) -> forall n : nat, P n
filter_le = fun (T : Type) (F G : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) => forall P : T -> Prop, G P -> F P : forall T : Type, ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope function_scope]
Tauto.GFormula_ind : forall P : Tauto.GFormula -> Prop, P Tauto.TT -> P Tauto.FF -> (forall t : ?TX, P (Tauto.X t)) -> (forall (t : ?TA) (a : ?AA), P (Tauto.A t a)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.Cj g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.D g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> P (Tauto.N g)) ->...-> forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g where ?TA : [T : CompleteSpace |- Type] ?TX : [T : CompleteSpace |- Type] ?AA : [T : CompleteSpace |- Type] ?AF : [T : CompleteSpace |- Type]
filter_ex : forall P : ?T -> Prop, at_point ?a P -> exists x : ?T, P x where ?T : [T : CompleteSpace |- UniformSpace] ?a : [T : CompleteSpace |- UniformSpace.sort ?T]
filtermap = fun (T U : Type) (f : T -> U) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (P : U -> Prop) => F (fun x : T => P (f x)) : forall T U : Type, (T -> U) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> (U -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
N.peano_rect : forall P : N -> Type, P 0%N -> (forall n : N, P n -> P (N.succ n)) -> forall n : N, P n
filtermapi = fun (T U : Type) (f : T -> U -> Prop) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (P : U -> Prop) => F (fun x : T => exists y : U, f x y /\ P y) : forall T U : Type, (T -> U -> Prop) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> (U -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
open = fun (T : UniformSpace) (D : T -> Prop) => forall x : T, D x -> locally x D : forall T : UniformSpace, (T -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope]
